title: Sudden inspection at tuition classes in Gampaha
content: In the light of a camera being found hidden inside the womenâ€™s bathroom of a popular tuition class in Gampaha, all private tuition classes in the area have been subjected to sudden inspection.The inspection was conducted by the officers of the Gampaha Municipal Council, Sri Lanka Police and Public Health Inspectors on Friday (Feb. 18).It was revealed that the security of washrooms at two classes attended by a large number of students was at a minimal level.
